summary: Small mod that increases initial vendor gold then continues to increase based on level, changes gold refresh from 2 days to 1.
descriptionHtml:
Increases some starting vendors gold, then adds gold every 5 levels to all vendors. Also changes vendor gold refresh to 1 day instead of 2.

Add the MoreVendorGold.esp file to your C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data directory, start the game launcher/data, enable MoreVendorGold, then your ready to play.

Will be working on balancing and adding more if things go well depending on input.

See included spreadsheet for exact number details, all incremental gold values, modifiers and such.


Change log: 1.01

All these go up to level 70, but I can go higher if desired.

VendorGoldStreetVendor: 
Default Starting gold: 
Old:                             New: 
 50                                 300
Every 5 Levels:                +100
level 50 gold:                  1300

VendorGoldSpells:
Default Starting gold:        500
Every 5 levels:                 +150
level 50 gold:                  2000

VendorGoldMisc:
Default starting gold:         750
Every 5 levels:                 +150
level 50 gold:                   2250

VendorGoldInn:
Default starting gold:          100
Every 5 levels:                   +25
level 50 gold:                     350

VendorGoldBlacksmithTown:
Default starting gold:          500
Every 5 levels:                  +100
level 50 gold:                    1500

VendorGoldBlacksmithOrc:
Default starting gold:          400
Every 5 levels:                   +100
level 50:                           1400

VendorBlacksmith:
Default starting gold:        1000
Every 5 levels:                  +150
level 50:                          2500

VendorGoldApothecary:
Default starting gold:         500
Every 5 levels:                 +150
level 50 gold:                   2000
author: Whittaker Courtney
